question.title: Quin va ser el primer cantant d'Iron Maiden?

question.option: a) Killers, The Number of the Beast, Iron Maiden, Powerslave
b) Killers, Iron Maiden, The Number of the Beast, Powerslave
c) Iron Maiden, Killers, The Number of the Beast, Powerslave
